Module app
Package app.database

Class DbConnection

java.lang.Object
app.database.DbConnection
public class DbConnection extends Object
The DbConnection class represents a connection to a database. It provides methods to execute SQL statements and retrieve results.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DbConnection()
    Constructs a new DbConnection object and establishes a connection to the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void

    Closes the database connection.

    String

    Retrieves a string representation of the result set for the specified column label.
    ResultSet
    runStatement(String sqlStatement)
    Executes the given SQL statement and returns the result set.
    int
    runUpdate(String sqlStatement)
    Executes the given SQL statement, which may be an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement or an SQL statement that returns nothing, such as an SQL DDL statement.

  • Constructor Details

    • DbConnection

      public DbConnection()
      Constructs a new DbConnection object and establishes a connection to the database.

  • Method Details

    • runStatement

      public ResultSet runStatement(String sqlStatement)
      Executes the given SQL statement and returns the result set.
      Parameters:
      sqlStatement - the SQL statement to execute
      Returns:
      the result set of the executed SQL statement

    • runUpdate

      public int runUpdate(String sqlStatement)
      Executes the given SQL statement, which may be an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement or an SQL statement that returns nothing, such as an SQL DDL statement.
      Parameters:
      sqlStatement - the SQL statement to execute
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the command; 0 if no rows are affected or the statement does not return anything

    • getNextAvailableId

      public int getNextAvailableId(String tableName)
      Retrieves the next available ID from the specified table. This is useful for inserting new rows with a unique ID.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to retrieve the next available ID from
      Returns:
      the next available ID; -1 if an error occurs

    • getResultString

      public String getResultString(ResultSet result, String columnLabel)
      Retrieves a string representation of the result set for the specified column label.
      Parameters:
      result - the result set to retrieve the string representation from
      columnLabel - the label of the column to retrieve the string representation from
      Returns:
      a string representation of the result set for the specified column label

    • getResultArray

      public ArrayList<String> getResultArray(ResultSet result, String columnLabel)
      Parameters:
      result -
      columnLabel - the label of the column to retrieve the string representation from
      Returns:
      ArrayList an array representation of the result set for the specified column label

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the database connection.
